original_text: If they pray in that way and they trust that God will answer them, the sick person will become well again. The Lord will cause him to become well. And God will forgive him if he has done any wrong things.
korean_text: 믿음의 기도는 병든 자를 구원하리니 주께서 그를 일으키시리라 혹시 죄를 범하였을지라도 사하심을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: If they pray in that way
and they trust that God will answer them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님이 그들에게 응답하실 것을 신뢰한다면

sentences.original_text: the sick person will become well again
sentences.korean_translation: 아픈 사람은 다시 건강하게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord will cause him to become well
if he has done any wrong things
